metadata.feature_description: Enables uploading of images, documents, and generic files with multipart support and automatic path generation.

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel via Content > Assets > My Website
steps.expected: Assets panel opens showing folders and files
steps.actual: Assets panel opened successfully showing folders (Badges, Groups, Images, etc.) and files

steps.action: Click Add Asset button to open upload dialog
steps.expected: Upload dialog appears with drag-and-drop area
steps.actual: Upload dialog opened with 'Drag and Drop a File or Select an Option' message and File button
File uploaded successfully with 'File uploaded' status and thumbnail preview

steps.action: Select multiple image files (test_image2.png and test_image3.png) for upload
steps.actual: test_image3.png uploaded successfully. test_image2.png detected as duplicate and showed Keep/Replace options
test_document.txt uploaded successfully with 'File uploaded' status and document icon

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Upload file with special characters in name

steps.expected: File with special characters uploads successfully
steps.actual: File uploaded successfully with filename preserved including special characters @#$%

steps.expected: System should reject the file with appropriate error message
steps.actual: File rejected with 'File extension not allowed.' error message in red with X icon

steps.expected: File uploads or shows size limit error
steps.actual: 10MB file uploaded successfully - default size limit appears to be higher than 10MB

steps.action: Upload file with same name as existing file (test_image2.png)
steps.expected: System should detect duplicate and offer options
steps.actual: System detected duplicate and displayed 'The file you want to upload already exists in this folder.' with Replace and Keep options

steps.action: Click Keep to preserve original file
steps.expected: Original file should be kept, upload should stop
steps.actual: File upload stopped and original file was preserved

steps.action: Open Add Asset dialog and verify drag-and-drop UI
steps.expected: Drag-and-drop area should be visible with instructions
steps.actual: Upload dialog shows 'Drag and Drop a File or Select an Option' with upload icon, Decompress Zip Files toggle, and Close button

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify uploaded files in Assets list

steps.action: Close upload dialog and verify all uploaded files appear in Assets list
steps.expected: All successfully uploaded files should appear in the Assets list
steps.actual: All uploaded files (test_single_image.png, test_image3.png, test_document.txt, test_special_chars_@#$%.txt, test_large_file.txt) visible in Assets list

observations: The file upload feature supports multipart file upload through the PersonaBar Assets panel
Drag-and-drop functionality UI is present (shows 'Drag and Drop a File' message), though actual drag-and-drop testing was not performed due to browser automation limitations
File extension validation works correctly - .exe files are blocked with 'File extension not allowed' error
Duplicate file detection works with Keep/Replace options provided to user
Special characters in filenames (@#$%) are handled correctly and preserved
The 10MB file size limit test passed, indicating the configured limit is higher than 10MB
The 'Decompress Zip Files' toggle option is available for automatic extraction of zip archives
File thumbnails are generated for image files and appropriate icons shown for document files
